name: THE SHRiNK Season One
description: In THE SHRiNK you play as a 23-year-old who lacks motivation. He lives in a house full of women in a small town called Woodsville. Life was always somewhat quiet and uneventful there... that is until today. An outbreak is about to hit your hometown. Coincidentally today is also your birthday and you have decided it's time to make some changes in your life but the effects of this virus are set to change your life in ways you could never imagine.
